name: Zarzuela
review: Zarzuela is a tapas restaurant in San Francisco's trendy Russian Hill neighborhood.
Try the 'Callos A La Madrilena' (Madrid style tripe). Don't ask ... just enjoy.

name: La Tasca
review: La Tasca is located right next to the Metro Rail Station in Arlington Heights.
It has a 'bar' feel to it and serves excellent inexpensive tapas.
